content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT rate_code_id,rate_code
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/rate_code_multi_line.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent nvarchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result] cross apply openjson(jsonContent) with (rate_code_id smallint, rate_code varchar(20))
